name: Save the baby - Adventure game
description:
With this interactive and thrilling puzzle game, you have one big mission - saving the baby!
Having and raising a baby is the hardest job. Now you can answer those burning questions yourself and see what being a mom or dad truly feels like!

Parents go through a lot of challenges to raise their baby right. Now you can be one of them. The future of your child is entirely and solely up to you. Will they be a happy toddler? Will they be a good kid. Do you have the parenting skills, knowledge, and confidence to make the best decisions for your baby? Play the game to find out!

Save the Baby is a thrilling baby raising simulation, where you have to overcome a lot of real-life challenges and uncover some exciting secrets as you go. You will be presented with different scenarios and it will be your responsibility to decide the fate & the future of your baby! Use your wit & your IQ to be the best parent for your child.

There are so many levels you need to overcome to save the baby! The funny scenarios and the tricky problems in this puzzle game will train your brain and prepare you for real-life parenting.

Main Game Features:

● The future is up to you: you’re the one making life-changing choices and deciding the fate of your baby.
● The puzzle game unfolds as a thrilling story, where you go through a lot of challenges and uncover secrets along the way.
● There are many levels to solve, so you need to use your IQ and wit.
● The story is absolutely addicting and satisfactory to play.

Being a mom is the best, but yet the hardest thing to be. Can you raise your baby right? Let’s try it out! Download Save the Baby to see!
